column1:
白竜、力授けた
オレ、お前、試してやる
column2:
White Dragon, grant me power.
I will test you.

column1:
オレ、お前、試してやる
試練の場、来い
column2:
I will test you.
Come to trial grounds.

column1:
待ってた
オレ、共に戦う
column2:
I've been waiting.
We will fight together.

column1:
色んな矢、選んで使え
射ち方、試せ
column2:
Choose and use various arrows.
Test your shooting.

column1:
お前なら大丈夫
新しい技、使える
技の継承、俺の家でやる
column2:
You'll be fine.
You can use the new skill.
Skill transfer, at my place.

column1:
お前、いいハンターなった
新しい技使える、大丈夫
column2:
You've become a good Hunter. 
You can use new techniques, will be fine.

column1:
技の継承、俺の家でやる
家で待つ
column2:
Pass on the techniques at my place.
Wait for me at home.

column1:
この技、強い弓
お前扱える、大丈夫
column2:
This technique, a strong bow.
You can handle it, no problem.

column1:
お前、いいハンターなった
もっといいハンター、なれる
column2:
You've become a good hunter.
Become an even better one.

column1: 様々な矢、使いこなすのがハンター
回避して自分守る、大切なこと

column2: Aim for the weak point, important.

column1: 間合い、ちゃんと見てるか
敵の状態に合わせた攻撃、ハンターなら当然
column2:
Use attacks that match the enemy's 
condition, as a hunter should.
Do not let your prey escape.
